event.title: OpenCloud Camp-mCloud(Openstack) MVP
event.description:
Built on a cutting-edge blueprint that combines pre-assembled best-of-breed hyperscale hardware with advanced software, Morphlabs’ sophisticated efficient computing technology manages IT resources for enterprise consumption– including compute, networking, and storage. Simplicity, cost efficiency and ease of use are our paramount concerns because we’re committed to delivering the most price performant, blazing fast, reliable private cloud for the enterprise.
Available with flexible payment options, the mCloud Data Center Unit (DCU) solution mitigates risk and enables companies of any size to compete quickly with the first all-SSD cloud solution on the market. The mCloud DCU delivers Dynamic Infrastructure Services (DIS), the virtual private cloud counterpart to basic public Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) — the best solution for organizations that face a choice between public cloud solutions that do not provide the control they need and cost-prohibitive private cloud solutions that are too complex.
